Body:
"""Get / Set position count for APT Piezo Inertia Actuator.

    Tested with KIM101 driver connected to PIM1 mirror mount.
    """
with expected_protocol(ik.thorlabs.APTPiezoInertiaActuator, [init_kim101[0],
    ThorLabsPacket(message_id=ThorLabsCommands.PZMOT_REQ_PARAMS, param1=5,
    param2=1, dest=80, source=1, data=None).pack(), ThorLabsPacket(
    message_id=ThorLabsCommands.PZMOT_SET_PARAMS, param1=None, param2=None,
    dest=80, source=1, data=struct.pack('<HHll', 5, 3, 100, 0)).pack()], [
    init_kim101[1], ThorLabsPacket(message_id=ThorLabsCommands.
    PZMOT_GET_PARAMS, dest=1, source=80, data=struct.pack('<HHll', 5, 1, 0,
    0)).pack()], sep='') as apt:
    assert apt.channel[0].position_count == 0
    apt.channel[2].position_count = 100
